title: 熔炉Shift取出无法获得经验
author: ZMHniconico
txt_content:
服务端:spongeforge1.12.2-2768-7.1.4插件:Gluon-1.0.4  KaroglanSignEditor-3.3-API7  LuckPerms-Sponge-4.3.33  Nucleus-1.6.3-S7.1-MC1.12.2-plugin  PlaceholderAPI-4.4  TotalEconomy-1.8.1   VirtualChest-1.0.0-rc-1  worldedit-sponge-6.1.9-SNAPSHOT-dist
如题,使用Shift取出的时候无法获得经验,但是正常左键取出就可以
